actions.text: On agreeing to the Webster (FL) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment to prevent federal agencies from implementing significant policy changes without appropriate congressional review. The amendment brings administrative rules having an economic impact of $100 million or more as scored by OMB before Congress for a vote.
purpose: An amendment No. 11 printed in Part B of House Report 113-187 to prevent federal agencies from implementing significant policy changes without appropriate congressional review. The amendment brings administrative rules having an economic impact of $100 million or more as scored by OMB before Congress for a vote.
